mapper.select: select cpi.logo,cpi.company_name,cpi.revenue,cpi.headcount from career cr,resume rs, companyinfo cpi where ((cr.resume_num=rs.resume_num) and (cpi.company_code=cr.company_code)) and rs.user_id=#{ userId } order by cr.join_date desc

select riv.review_num,cpi.company_name,riv.title,riv.input_date,riv.content from review riv,companyinfo cpi where (riv.company_code=cpi.company_code) and riv.user_id=#{ userId } and riv.delete_flag='N' order by input_date desc
